original_text: And he left all that he had in Joseph's hand; and he knew not ought he had, save the bread which he did eat. And Joseph was a goodly person, and well favoured.
korean_text: 주인이 그의 소유를 다 요셉의 손에 위탁하고 자기가 먹는 음식 외에는 간섭하지 아니하였더라 요셉은 용모가 빼어나고 아름다웠더라

sentences.original_text: And he left all that he had in Joseph's hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 가진 모든 것을 요셉의 손에 맡겼고

sentences.original_text: and he knew not ought he had
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기가 가진 것을 전혀 알지 못했으니

sentences.original_text: save the bread which he did eat
And Joseph was a goodly person
